name: Anatarrastrya Pariwar Sewa Sansthan
briefDescription: ANTARRASTRIYA PARIWAR SEWA SANSTHAN having current activities of the society is providing health services in rural areas such as awareness.Current activities of the society is providing health services in rural & urban areas such as awareness activities in wages labour,Society is doing in other field as education for children ,scientific awareness in rural people awareness programme for health and sanitation,computer education for minorities, awareness campaign for environment .Rural Development programme and other related social works was completed in a very successful manner Awareness of incifilitice control programe. Awareness of payjal. Leadership Development of Minority womens training programme Aganbari & Sabala training programe & Handicraft development programme, Traning & Seminar workshop programme,women labour registration and child mobile crache.the number of people served is 50,000.
